scenes.background: (Bob) looks frustrated, crossing his arms. (Monica) looks at you with a pleading expression.
scenes.description: 'I don't think you understand how critical this is. Are you really going to leave us hanging?'

options.text: I understand the urgency, but my leave is essential for me to recharge. Let's find another solution.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the urgency but emphasized your need for rest, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation to help.

options.text: Alright, I'll help out, but I can only spare an hour.
options.analysis: You offered limited help, showing balanced empathy and social skills, though your motivation and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: This constant reliance on me isn't sustainable. We need to rethink our approach to handling emergencies.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, and it might strain your relationship with colleagues.
